items.sentence: I thought Tom would surprise Mary and take her to dinner.
I took it for granted that she would come to our wedding.
I want to find out how many people died in that accident.
To be happy, you should spend time with someone you love.
Tom always feels depressed during the cold winter months.
Tom and Mary are planning to vote for the same candidate.
Tom and Mary have recently bought a house on Park Street.
Tom and Mary were both sitting cross-legged on the floor.
Tom and his friends play poker almost every Friday night.
From what I\'ve heard, I think Tom is going to get fired.
Tom thinks that Mary and I can\'t take care of ourselves.
Tom thinks that he\'s better at French than he really is.
Tom thinks there\'s a good chance that Mary will say yes.
I started working six days a week about three months ago.
I still have the sweater you gave me when I was thirteen.
I\'m not worried about you, Tom. I\'m worried about Mary.
If Tom didn\'t have this pillow, he\'d miss it very much.
If there is anything you want, don\'t hesitate to ask me.
What\'s the name of the person who recommended us to you?
What\'s the scariest thing that has ever happened to you?
